[10-May-2025 15:37:32 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_gupshup_gs_abandoned_cart ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `time` DATETIME, `gupshup_session_key` CHAR(32) NOT NULL, `status` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `customer_data` LONGTEXT NOT NULL, `customer_phone` VARCHAR(14) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`, `gupshup_session_key`)) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4

  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
